our_story_bio_1: La Argentina Caffe brings the authentic flavors of Argentina to your table. Our passion for quality ingredients and traditional recipes has made us a beloved destination for food enthusiasts.
our_story_bio_2: Every dish is prepared with care, honoring the rich culinary heritage of Argentina while adding our own unique touch. From our famous empanadas to our perfectly balanced milanesa sandwiches, we promise an unforgettable experience at affordable prices.
our_story_bio_3: Bringing the authentic taste of Argentina to your neighborhood at great prices.
rights_reserved: La Argentina Caffe. All rights reserved

menu_items.croquettes_sandwich_desc: Ham and cheese croquettes with lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonnaise
menu_items.choripan_desc: Grill sausage with lettuce, tomatoes, and chimichurri sauce
menu_items.milanesa_sandwich_desc: Your choice of beef or chicken breaded with lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonnaise
menu_items.chicken_grilled_desc: Cheese, bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonnaise
menu_items.lomito_desc: Sautéed beef topped with ham, cheese, fried egg, lettuce, and tomatoes
menu_items.ham_and_cheese_empanada_desc: Bread dough stuffed with ham and cheese, red peppers
menu_items.shredded_beef_empanada_desc: Bread dough shredded beef, onions, red peppers, green peppers
menu_items.spinach_empanada_desc: Bread dough stuffed with spinach and cheese
menu_items.chicken_empanada_desc: Pollo, onions, green peppers, and red peppers
menu_items.beef_or_chicken_kebab_desc: Beef or chicken mixed with vegetables grilled over the barbecue
menu_items.chicken_with_lime_sauce_desc: Chicken breast sautéed with white wine, lime juice, and heavy cream
menu_items.palomilla_steak_desc: Top round beef sautéed with grilled onions and tomatoes
menu_items.chicken_picata_desc: Chicken breast sautéed with limes, capers, and onions
menu_items.chicken_curry_sauce_desc: Sautéed chicken breast with curry white wine, finished with heavy cream
menu_items.shrimp_scampi_desc: Sautéed shrimp with garlic, lemon juice, white wine, and paprika
menu_items.shrimp_grilled_or_in_sauce_desc: Camarones a la plancha o en salsa
menu_items.lomo_saltado_desc: Sautéed beef with onions, tomatoes, and peppers, French fries, and served with soy sauce and rice
menu_items.monday_special_desc: Beef or Chicken Breaded with potato salad / mix salad
menu_items.tuesday_special_desc: Grill Chicken with Grill Onion on Top with moro rice, tostones, salad
menu_items.wednesday_special_desc: Pabellon (Venezuelan Specialty) - Shredded beef sautéed w/ onions & peppers served with white rice, red beans, plantains, and a fried egg
menu_items.thursday_special_desc: Beef and Potato Stew - Rice, fries, plantains
menu_items.friday_special_desc: Chicken Stew - Yellow rice, tostones, salad
menu_items.saturday_special_desc: Pasta Penne alla Bolognese - Seasoned ground beef with carrots, celery, onions, tomatoes, slowly cooked
menu_items.scrambled_eggs_desc: Ham / Cheese / Plain / Vegetables onions and peppers
menu_items.two_fried_eggs_desc: Served with fresh fried bacon, tostada, and caffé
menu_items.croissant_ham_cheese_or_eggs: Croissant with Ham & Cheese or Eggs
